001package ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.persistence.segment;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.SegmentPersistencePort;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.capture.SegmentRecord;
005import ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.persistence.SegmentIoAdapter;
006import java.nio.file.Path;
007
008/**
009 * File-based {@link SegmentPersistencePort} that writes captured segments using the SGB1 format.
010 * <p>Not thread-safe; external synchronization required for concurrent use.</p>
011 *
012 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
013 */
014public final class SegmentFileSinkAdapter implements SegmentPersistencePort {
015  private final SegmentIoAdapter.Writer writer;
016
017  /**
018   * Creates a new sink that rolls files after {@code rollMiB}.
019   *
020   * @param directory output directory
021   * @param baseName file prefix for rolled files
022   * @param rollMiB roll size in mebibytes; non-positive disables rolling
023   * @throws IllegalStateException if the underlying writer cannot be created
024   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
025   */
026  public SegmentFileSinkAdapter(Path directory, String baseName, int rollMiB) {
027    try {
028      this.writer = new SegmentIoAdapter.Writer(directory, baseName, rollMiB);
029    } catch (Exception e) {
030      throw new IllegalStateException("Failed to create segment writer", e);
031    }
032  }
033
034  /**
035   * Persists the provided segment record.
036   *
037   * @param record record to persist; {@code null} is ignored
038   * @throws Exception if writing fails
039   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
040   */
041  @Override
042  public void persist(SegmentRecord record) throws Exception {
043    if (record == null) return;
044    writer.append(record);
045  }
046
047  /**
048   * Flushes pending data to disk.
049   *
050   * @throws Exception if flushing fails
051   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
052   */
053  @Override
054  public void flush() throws Exception {
055    writer.flush();
056  }
057
058  /**
059   * Closes the underlying writer.
060   *
061   * @throws Exception if closing fails
062   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
063   */
064  @Override
065  public void close() throws Exception {
066    writer.close();
067  }
068}
